channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Redistricting in Indiana faces ultimate test in state Senate
item.description: Indiana state senators are gathering in Indianapolis to finally weigh in on mid-cycle redistricting

item.title: UN aid coordination agency cuts appeal for 2026 to $33B after lowest annual support in a decade
item.description: The U.N.’s humanitarian aid coordinator is downsizing its appeal for annual funding in 2026 after support this year — mostly from Western governments ...

item.title: Mamdani tells immigrant New Yorkers about their right not to comply with ICE
item.description: The New York City mayor-elect posted a video explaining immigrants' right.

item.title: A second flight of Iranian deportees, carrying 55, has left the US, Iran says
item.description: Iranian officials say a second flight carrying deported Iranians has left the United States

item.title: Key GOP senator says he has no objection to releasing video of strike that killed two survivors
item.description: The Republican who leads the Senate Intelligence Committee says a video of a U_S_ military strike on an alleged drug boat in the Caribbean that killed...
